doc: In older posts (from Strapi v2 announcements) I saw that JSON:API support (https://jsonapi.org/format/) was mentioned as a future feature (as a plugin, like GraphQL). I wasn't able to find back the link. In the current v3.0 beta release I cannot find anything about this topic. I'm wondering what happened with this feature and I'm curious what the rationales where behind the decisions.

My company is currently trying to work with JSON:API, together with Open API. Those two can be used side-by-side, JSON:API tightens the the params used in your API while Open API is great for documenting this.
